story.title: Why Moldova Direct?
story.subtitle: We are on a mission to make Moldovaâ€™s heritage ingredients and winemaking accessible to curious palates everywhere.

heritage.title: Heritage you can taste
heritage.description: Every collection highlights native grapes, protected origins, and regional recipes.

craft.title: Craft-first sourcing
craft.description: We work with small cooperatives and family estates that prioritise sustainable farming.

pairings.title: Pairings & expertise
pairings.description: Sommelier notes and chef-inspired pairings accompany each delivery.

timeline.title: From Moldova to Spain

items.title: First harvest partnerships
items.description: Launched with three pioneering wineries from the Codru region.

items.title: Nationwide delivery

items.title: Culinary collaborations

faqPreview.title: Questions before you order?
faqPreview.subtitle: Weâ€™ve answered the essentials to make your first delivery effortless.

shipping.question: How fast is shipping in Spain?
shipping.answer: Orders ship twice per week from our Madrid hub with delivery in 48â€“72 hours for most locations.

packaging.question: Will my order arrive chilled?
packaging.answer: Yes. Temperature-controlled packaging keeps wines and perishables at optimal conditions throughout transit.

support.question: Can I speak with someone for recommendations?
support.answer: Our concierge team is available via WhatsApp and email to suggest pairings and build custom boxes.

delivery.question: How fast do you deliver?
delivery.answer: Orders placed before 16:00 ship the same day and arrive within 48 hours in mainland Spain.

storage.question: How should I store it?
storage.answer: Keep in a cool, dry space away from direct sunlight. Wines rest best between 12â€“18Â°C.

allergens.question: Does it contain allergens?
allergens.answer: Full allergen and ingredient details are listed on the label and product page. Contact us for specifics.

returns.question: What if something arrives damaged?
returns.answer: Let us know within 7 days and weâ€™ll organise a replacement or full refund immediately.

returns.title: Returns & Refunds
returns.description: Simple steps to report issues, request replacements, or receive refunds for Moldova Direct orders.

window.title: Return window
window.description: Unopened pantry items within 30 days of delivery

condition.title: Condition
condition.description: Keep original packaging for fast approval

support.title: Support
support.description: Concierge help in EN / ES / RO / RU

eligibility.title: What qualifies for a return?
eligibility.subtitle: We prioritise safety and freshness for every order.

allowed.quality: Quality or safety concern reported within 7 days

denied.used: Opened, used, or partially consumed items
denied.perishable: Perishable items without a reported issue on delivery
denied.custom: Custom or personalised orders without defects

eligibility.note: For wine, store bottles upright and avoid extreme temperatures while we review your case.

resolution.title: Resolution options
resolution.subtitle: Choose what works best for you once we validate the issue.

refund.title: Refund to original payment
refund.description: Issued after inspection, typically within 2â€“5 business days.

replacement.title: Replacement shipment
replacement.description: We resend the correct or undamaged items at no extra cost for our error.

credit.title: Store credit
credit.description: Instant credit for future orders while we pick up the original items.

resolution.note: Select your preferred option in your request. We confirm availability before shipping replacements.

steps.title: How to start a return
steps.subtitle: Share details so we can resolve your request quickly.

review.title: Review your order
review.description: Note the affected items, quantities, and delivery date.

document.title: Document the issue
document.description: Take clear photos of packaging, labels, and any damage.

contact.title: Submit your request
contact.description: Email us or use the contact form with your order number and preference (refund, replacement, credit).

ship.title: Prepare pickup or drop-off
ship.description: Keep items in original packaging. We coordinate courier pickup or a drop-off label where required.

steps.packagingDescription: Keep bottles upright, seal boxes securely, and include all accessories or gifts.

fees.title: Costs & coverage
fees.description: We cover shipping for our mistakes. Other cases follow the policy below.

items.ourError: Free return shipping for damaged, incorrect, or defective items
items.customerChoice: Change-of-mind returns may require return shipping
items.inspection: Refunds issued after inspection and quality verification

expectations.title: What to expect
expectations.description: Transparent updates from request to resolution.

items.scan: Tracking shared once a courier label is issued
items.refundTimeline: Refunds processed 2â€“5 business days after inspection
items.updates: Status updates via email at each stage

support.title: Need help fast?
support.description: Our concierge team is ready to guide your return or exchange.
support.responseTime: We reply within 48 business hours (often sooner).

faqPage.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqPage.description: Quick answers about ordering, delivery, returns, and authentic Moldovan products in Spain.
faqPage.updated: Updated weekly with the latest delivery and product details.
faqPage.languages: Support in EN / ES / RO / RU

items.dispatch: Orders placed before 16:00 ship same day from Madrid.
items.packaging: Shock-resistant packaging for wines and delicate products.
items.support: Human support team ready to solve issues fast.

turnaround.title: Priority handling
turnaround.description: Damaged or missing items are replaced immediately after verification.

delivery.question: How fast do you deliver?
delivery.answer: Orders placed before 16:00 ship the same day and arrive within 48â€“72 hours in mainland Spain. Express options appear at checkout where available.

shippingCosts.question: What are the shipping costs?
shippingCosts.answer: Standard shipping is calculated at checkout based on weight and postcode. We offer free delivery on baskets over â‚¬69 in mainland Spain.

updates.question: How do I track my order?
updates.answer: You'll receive tracking by email and SMS once dispatched. You can also follow progress anytime on the Track Order page with your email and order number.

methods.question: Which payment methods do you accept?
methods.answer: We accept major cards, Bizum, and secure bank transfers. All payments are encrypted and PSD2 compliant.

invoices.question: Can I get a business invoice?
invoices.answer: Yes. Add your company details and tax ID at checkout, and your invoice will be issued automatically after payment.

addresses.question: Can I ship to a different address?
addresses.answer: Yes, enter a separate shipping address during checkout. We'll keep billing information for your records.

policy.question: What is your return policy?
policy.answer: You have 30 days to return unopened items in original condition. Weâ€™ll arrange a prepaid label or courier pickup where available.

damaged.question: What if a bottle arrives damaged?
damaged.answer: Take a photo of the package and the damaged item, then contact support. We ship a replacement or issue a refund immediately.

process.question: How do I start a return or exchange?
process.answer: Visit the Returns page or contact support with your order number. Weâ€™ll confirm eligibility and share the next steps within one business day.

authenticity.question: Are your products authentic from Moldova?
authenticity.answer: Yes. We work directly with Moldovan producers and certify origin on every label. Our Madrid fulfilment centre handles controlled storage.

storage.question: How should I store wines and delicacies?
storage.answer: Keep wines between 12â€“18Â°C away from direct sunlight. Pantry items should stay in a cool, dry place; refrigerate after opening if indicated.

allergens.question: Where can I see allergen information?
allergens.answer: Allergen details are listed on each product page and label. Contact us for specific ingredient clarifications before ordering.

needMore.title: Need more help?
needMore.description: Share your order number and a short noteâ€”our team replies within one business hour.

commitment.title: Service promise
commitment.description: Real humans, fast answers, and proactive fixes for delivery issues.
